title: How AI is Changing Culture
excerpt: Artificial intelligence is becoming a cultural force, influencing music, design, and identity...
body:
Artificial intelligence is no longer just a buzzword—it’s become a cultural force. From the way we consume music and fashion, to how we engage with visual storytelling and brand identity, AI is reshaping everything.

This isn’t about machines replacing artists—it’s about enhancing and scaling vision in a way that was never possible before.

title: From Engineer to Entrepreneur
excerpt: My transition from DevOps engineer to investor, and the hard lessons learned...
body:
I started out as a DevOps engineer, focused on implementation, automation, and optimization. Over time, I realized I wanted more — not just to build, but to own.

Becoming an entrepreneur wasn’t easy. It took mindset shifts, financial discipline, and building teams. But I wouldn't trade the freedom for anything.
